channel.title: Devops on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Notes

item.title: Docker
item.description: Docker is a container technology. Cointainers standardize software packaging. It’s a well timed fusion of kernel features filesystem tricks networking hacks Think of a container not as a virtual machine but a very lightweight wrapper around an isolated group of processes. These processes are restricted to private root filesystem and process namespace. Docker revision-controls: filesystem layers image tags Architecture Terminology Docker server - the docker command run in daemon mode on a Linux host:

item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Docker is a container technology. It’s a well timed fusion of kernel features filesystem tricks networking hacks Think of a container not as a virtual machine but a very lightweight wrapper around a single Unix process (or multiple processes). Docker revision-controls: filesystem layers image tags Architecture Terminology Docker server - the docker command run in daemon mode on a Linux host: $ sudo docker -d -H unix:///var/run/docker.
